tooltip.kubejs.flavor.log_2: You will need them almost any time, so gather more!
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.cobblestone_1: They seems to be annoying when mining.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.cobblestone_2: But sometimes you just don't have enough.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.cake_1: What do you think these red dots are?
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.salmon_1: A restaurant in Taiwan once held an event in which if your
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.salmon_2: name includes "salmon" you get free salmon, some actually
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.salmon_3: changed their names for it, but the law limited the times of
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.salmon_4: changing names, so some just live with "salmon" forever.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.cod: Cods may be the most popular seafish around the world.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.pufferfish_1: Pufferfishes can gather toxins from their food.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.pufferfish_2: But some says they are very yummy.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.pufferfish_3: Maybe one day I'll make you try them first.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.cookie: Don't feed parrots with cookies, the chocolate on cookies is poisonous for them!
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.poisonous_potato_1: Sprouted potatoes will produce solanine, making them poisonous.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.poisonous_potato_2: You can't get rid of solanine by cutting the sprouts, so just throw them away!
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.poisonous_potato_3: §mYou can plant them in real life, but not in Minecraft.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.poisonous_potato_4: Good news! I hacked the genes of potato, they can be planted now!
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.potato_1: You can cook potatoes in many ways.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.workbench_1: Under an apple tree, the snake told Adam and Eve how to use crafting table.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.workbench_2: Then they made a TNT that blew up the Eden accidentally. After that they were exiled.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.sea_pickle: Actually not edible even it's named pickle.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.dragon_egg_1: Will it hatch a baby dragon?
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.firework_rocket_1: Theoretically there are 1.9E136 ways to craft a firework rocket, it's impossible
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.firework_rocket_2: to list them all, but the simplest way is gunpowder and paper.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.firework_star_1: Theoretically there are 2.9E19 ways to craft a firework star, it's impossible to
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.firework_star_2: list them all, but the simplest way is gunpowder and dye.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.ambergris: Produced in the digestive system of sperm whales, smells like isopropanol.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.tall_flower_1: Can be obtained by plating petals!
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.sink_1: Why so many modpack banned its infinity water?
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.ender_chest_1: I tell you, this mod is older than ender chest in Minecraft!
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.ender_chest_2: In fact, Minecraft's ender chest is inspired by this mod.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.eternal_stella_1: May be the most overpowered item in this modpack.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.eternal_stella_2: Press U to see what this can do!
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.steel_casing_2: If you played other expert modpacks you won't think so.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.cable_1: Do you know if you connect more cable together their transmission rate multiplies?
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.cable_2: However there is still a limit, it's 9.22E18 FE/t.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.magic_beans: Have you heard the story of Jack and the Beanstalk?
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.pink_slime_ingot_1: Eeeh? Did I just saw a face on it?
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.pink_slime_ingot_2: (Rubbing eyes) No? Maybe I just got it wrong.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.music_sheet: This will be easy for you if you know MIDI.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.drifting_bottle: A drifting bottle! Who threw it into the sea?
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.taiyaki: Made of adzuki beans and flour.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.engulfing_lightnin: The naginata was a lethal weapon by which scattered dross might be cut away.
And the one who wielded that naginata was one who guarded the path to eternity.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.nwither_plush_1: The sponsor says I can make anything I like or a plushie of me, I
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.nwither_plush_2: planned to just make a random thing, but that's sort of inappropriate,
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.nwither_plush_3: so I made this. As for sophisticated model, that's out of my reach.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.pale_diamond_1: A common diamond without special color, but in real life,
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.pale_diamond_2: blue diamonds like those in MC are very rare and special.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.ruby: Corundum, contains chromium which makes it red.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.sapphire_1: Corundum, its blue color comes from iron and titianium.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.sapphire_2: Do you know, any corundum that's not red are sapphire.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.amethyst_1: Ancient Greeks believes amythyst can prevent them from getting drunk.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.amethyst_2: I don't know why the mod adds its own amethyst with vanilla amethyst
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.amethyst_3: already existing. Maybe it's the polished version.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.opal_1: A hydrated amorphous form of silica, their internal structure diffracts light,
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.opal_3: Some fossils may be replaced by opal.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.garnet: Their general formula is X₃Y₂(SiO₄)₃, it should be almandine according to its color.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.topaz: A silicate mineral of aluminum and fluorine.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.peridot: A common mineral found in earth and moon's rock.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.aquamarine_1: My favorite gemstone, beautiful and cheap.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.aquamarine_2: The main reason is the latter right?
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.zircon: Sorry I didn't find anything interesting to put here...
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.alexandrite_1: A kind of chrysoberyl, its color changes with ambient lighting, this is from
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.alexandrite_2: small scale replacement of aluminum by chromium ions in its crystal structure.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.alexandrite_3: A chatoyant chrysoberyl is called cymophane.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.tanzanite: Only found in a small area in Tanzania, making them expensive.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.tourmaline: Has many species and varieties, the square in the formula is a vacancy.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.black_opal: Its black color comes from some metal elements.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.citrine: A variety of quartz, like amethyst.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.morganite: A variety of beryl, the manganese ions result in its pink color.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.ametrine: Literally the combination of amethyst and citrine, very rare.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.banana_1: How to grow a banana tree?
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.banana_2: Plant a piece of banana leaf, it will grow in rain.
tooltip.kubejs.flavor.gamers_glove_1: Rhythm game players' best choice! Makes your hand moves light-speed!
tooltip.kubejs.infinity_ingot_1: As this modpack is still in very early development, you may not be able to craft this yet.
tooltip.kubejs.infinity_ingot_2: But you can prepare for it now!
tooltip.kubejs.ender_apple: Do NOT eat, may cause the game stuck!
tooltip.kubejs.laser_wrench_1: Shift + rightclick to choose the target,
tooltip.kubejs.pipez_1: This pipe is not intelligent enough to know what you want to do,
tooltip.kubejs.pipez_2: you need a wrench (any item with #forge:wrenches tag are valid,
tooltip.kubejs.pipez_3: can be searched in JEI by inputting $wrenches). Shift + rightclick
tooltip.kubejs.pipez_4: to make pipe extract item/fluid/energy, shift + rightclick again to
tooltip.kubejs.sophisticatedstorage_craf: Crafted by surrounding a basic chest/barrel/shulker box with 8 iron ingots.
Crafted by surrounding a iron chest/barrel/shulker box with 8 gold ingots.
Crafted by surrounding a gold chest/barrel/shulker box with 8 diamonds.
Crafted in smithing table like netherite tools.
tooltip.kubejs.sophisticatedstorage_shul: Can also be crafted like vanilla shulker boxes.
tooltip.kubejs.affix_gem_1: Gem in your main hand, the item with affix in your offhand, rightclick to move the affix to the gem.
tooltip.kubejs.affix_gem_2: Gem in your main hand, the item in your offhand, rightclick to move the affix to the item.
tooltip.kubejs.ender_tank: DON'T check its usage via JEI, may damage your game!
tooltip.kubejs.compost: Acquired by composting organic wastes in Batch Composter.
tooltip.kubejs.hephaestus_forge: Build a multiblock structure to use Hephaestus Forge, see Omniguide for more info.
kubejs.server_events.book: Here! Don't lose it this time!
patchouli.book.omniguide.name: Omniguide
patchouli.book.omniguide.landing_text: Welcome to Omniworld! This book will help you play this modpack. $(br)As the content of this book is ported from an older version, some content may be wrong!
